attributes.action: Stricter laws on Knife Crime to reduce the horrific deaths of young people.
attributes.additional_details:
Victims of Knife Crime leaving behind grieving families, broken dreams and a once promised future snatched away in the blink of an eye or in this context a stab of a blade.
Don't wait for change.
Don't let it be your son or daughter next to give you your wake up call.
 Please,
 let's make the world a safer place for our young people. Don't let a knife cut away someone's future. Please sign this petition to help save a life.
attributes.background:
216 deaths related to knife crime in London in 2016 alone with 9,000 reported incidents taking place in London this year.Not enough action has taken place to stop this.I believe tightening laws situated around knife crime could save lives making it harder for young people to gain
access to Knives.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the laws on knife crime to be changed.
